videos.title: 2025 Whiskey 50 Mile Off-Road - Prescott, Arizona
videos.description:
Alright folks, buckle up for a wild ride! 🤠 I took on the legendary Whiskey 50 Off-Road Race again, and let me tell you, it was a doozy! From epic climbs to thrilling descents (and maybe a few grunts along the way!), this video is your front-row seat to all the action.

I shot and narrated this entire thing while riding, so you're getting the raw, real experience straight from the bike. You'll see the highs, the lows, and everything in between that makes this race a truly unforgettable adventure.

If you love mountain biking, crazy challenges, or just want to see what it's like to tackle 50 miles off-road, then this video is for you!

Let me know in the comments if you've ever ridden the Whiskey 50 or what your favorite off-road race is!

videos.title: Whiskey Off-Road - 15, 30 or 50 miles of trailside bliss and good vibes on Whiskey Row
videos.description: Choose from three different distance options of 15, 30 or 50 miles; each consisting of a carefully curated set of trails in Prescott, AZ. Starting on Prescott’s historic (and lively) Whiskey Row and climbing into the beautiful Prescott National Forest. During your visit to Prescott, enjoy three fun-filled days of event festivities and being submerged in the mountain bike industry.

videos.title: Whiskey Off Road 15-Proof - FULL COURSE RIDE - 2025  - 2026 | Prescott, Arizona MTB Race Course
videos.description:
I’ve been asked about the Whiskey Off Road 15-proof Friday fun ride over the years. The Whiskey Off Road is 3-day (Friday-Sunday) mountain bike event and race held each spring here in Prescott, Arizona. There are 15-, 25-, and 50-mile (proof) options. The 15-proof (closer to 20 miles) fun ride is held on Friday. I have never raced the 15-proof, although I have raced the 50-proof and 30-proof a handful of times. For those that have asked; here you go. Have a safe and fun race. Good luck! And . .
Have a great ride. -- goMTB prescottAZ.

*NOTE: I knew I was going to have to do one camera battery swap for this ride. I deliberately chose to do this early at the Aspen Creek aid location prior to the start of the singletrack. The result is uninterrupted footage of all the singletrack to the end. 

*TIP: There are a few places that may hang up a rider if they’ve never ridden this course before:
Trail 393  -    46:50
Trail 327  -    50:48
Trail 321  - 1:01:42

*HISTORY NOTE: Trail(s) 327 and 393 were part of the earliest versions of the Whiskey Off Road course going back to 2004. Racers came the opposite direction on these up to the Aspen Creek aid station.

Season Rode/Recorded: SPRING

List of roads/trails in order:
Start/Finish Whiskey Row - 3:17
Goodwin Street - 3:35
Summit Ave - 4:49
Glenwood Ave – 5:57
Park Ave – 6:38
Country Club Dr. – 7:50
Highland Ave – 9:52
Copper Basin Road – 11:05
Trail 393 – 40:37
Trail 327 – 49:44
Trail 321 – 1:00:09
Trail 323 (Cramp Hill) – 1:03:39
Trail 326 – 1:09:44
Trail 392 – 1:11:33
Trail 324 – 1:16:32
Trail 318 – 1:23:26
Trail 316 – 1:33:20
Thumb Butte Rec – 1:34:38
Thumb Butte Rd – 1:35:09
Gurley Street – 1:41:45
Park Av 2 – 1:44:12
Glenwood Av 2 – 1:45:56
Summit Ave 2 – 1:46:10
Goodwin Street 2 – 1:46:33
Start/Finish Whiskey Row – 1:47:21

Please see my channel's "About" page for the intent of this channel. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnpJAeAtltnnzoVS9jY165w/about
Companion trail map used: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nllA_BtVPQU&feature=youtu.be
My playlist(s): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnpJAeAtltnnzoVS9jY165w/playlists
Whiskey Off Road 15-Proof Start/Finish GPS: 34.540916,  -112.470217
https://duckduckgo.com/?q=34.540916+-112.470217&atb=v314-1&iaxm=maps

videos.title: Whiskey Off-Road Bike Race Prescott Arizona 2024
videos.description:
Epic Rides Whiskey Off-Road Bike Race is one of Prescott, Arizona’s signature events. Mountain biking enthusiasts, their families and fans flock to Prescott’s famous Whiskey Row in the heart of downtown. The Whiskey Off-Road is considered to be one of the best MTB events in the entire southwestern United States. Great weather and hundreds of miles of hiking and biking trails draw thousands to Prescott every year, and are two more reasons people want to move here!

EPIC RIDES 2025 WHISKEY OFF-ROAD NOTIFICATION SIGN-UP:
https://epicrides.com/events/whiskey-off-road/2025-whiskey-off-road-pre-registration/

Grab my FREE PRESCOTT RESTAURANT GUIDE listing 45 restaurants in or near the downtown area. Click the link below and I’ll send a copy directly to your inbox! 
https://mailchi.mp/53d4966cabf8/restaurant-guide-01

Subscribe to AZKiltedRealtor: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3kexLzJbliKMOuBG3eLC5w/?sub_confirmation=1

Ered Matthew, REALTOR®
The Pareja Group – OwnPrescott
102 W Gurley St Prescott, AZ 86301
928.421.0555
ered@ownprescott.com

Life is short. Live in Prescott! 

Follow me on Instagram and Facebook: @azkiltedrealtor 
Website: http://www.azkiltedrealtor.com 

Timecodes:
0:00 – Intro
0:24 – Starting Line
0:50 – The Course
1:38 – Things to Do
1:55 – Off-Road 2025

#whiskeyoffroad #prescottaz #azkiltedrealtor #eredmatthew #epicrides 

Music Attribution: Hotlanta by TrackTribe – YouTube Audio Library

About:
The topic of this video is Prescott, Arizona’s annual Whiskey Off-Road Bike Race, produced by Epic Rides, one of the best MTB events in the southwest.

videos.title: Conquering The Epic Rides Whiskey 50 Backcountry Race!
videos.description:
Join me for an adrenaline-packed adventure as we take on the Epic Rides Whiskey 50 backcountry race in Prescott, Arizona. In this 50-mile race with just shy of 7,000 feet of climbing, I'll face challenging terrain, high altitudes, and unexpected obstacles that will push me to my limits. From the historic Whiskey Row to the rugged Skull Valley, we'll journey through some of the most beautiful scenery Arizona has to offer. 

#mtb #whiskey50 #mtbraddad

📸 Sportograf
